emails.content: This is a test mail with some content inside of it.
Test - message received by the instructor.

description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Hi,
thanks for the report, we will take a look at it and analyze what further actions should be taken.

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Hi,
thanks for the forward of the phishing mail, we will take a look into it and then update you on any findings.

CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? When I visited our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/ an hour ago, I could see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation. Now I suddenly cannot access the website at all.
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hi,

unfortunately the website you are trying to reach is currently under attack, we are currently investing this matter and for that reason we had to block trafic from and to that said website.
We apologise for inconvinience and we hope that the matter will be resolved soon.

SCIRT-U

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Dear CSIRT-MU, 

How long do you expect the website to be unavailable? Our clients are already complaining about it.

Before you blocked our website, some of them opened and saw the documents published there. They claim that those files contain sensitive information about them, and now they are complaining a lot. 

We would like to investigate the situation and find out what kind of documents they could have seen. That doesn't work if the page is blocked.

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hi,

unfortunatelly it is currently not known to us how long the site may be down for.

As for the clients that have clicked and sent some emails, we have already contacted them and advised them to change their credentials.

CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-MU, 

there are other problems related to leakage of sensitive information about our clients. Is there some possibility to see the content of the website before it was blocked? I cannot access the website anymore. Maybe you can? 

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hi,

Unfortunately, we cannot access the website as we would have to unblock it in order to access it, which could put users at risk of accessing the website and leaking more information. As such, we cannot.

CSIRT-U

Do you at least know what data was leaked when you already blocked our site?

Jane

Hi,

we were able to found out that the sensitive data that may have been compromised may have included names, emails and such. For this reason we have contacted DPO.

CSIRT-U

description: Email address of it_department, used to send spam

emails.content:
Hi,
there have been some reports of phishing attack that were send from your mail, we would like to ask for your cooperation in this matter and as such would like to ask you to check for any potencial injects or any other compromised parts of your system.

CSIRT-U

Hi,
going further it would also be wise to block trafic going from your email untill the said issue is resolved so that no further attacks can happen, as such the trafic from "it_department@mail.ex" will be blocked untill the issue is resolved.

CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Lisa Grant, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hi,
we a strong suspicion that u might have been a victim of phishing attack, as such we would advise for you to change your credentials.

CSIRT-U

Greetings,
Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.
Should I reinstall my computer???

Best regards,
Lisa Grant

Hi,

there is no need to reinstall your computer, as we stated in the email before you just have to change your credentials.

CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password. Should my friend Kathy, who clicked on the site, do the same?

Best regards,
Lisa Grant

description: Email address of Peter Quinn, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hi,
we a strong suspicion that u might have been a victim of phishing attack, as such we would advise for you to change your credentials.

CSIRT-U

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hi,
we would like to ask for your cooperation in the case of phishing attacks that are originating under your ip "198.51.100.40", could u provide us with as much possible information that u could?

CSIRT-U

Greetings, 

Can you please specify the information you required?


Best,
Cloud provider

Hi,

it would be great if you could provide us with logs of your website, also contents and lastly contact info for your administrator.

CSIRT-U

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

Hi,
thanks for your cooperation.

CSRIT-U

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Hi,

we are currently invastigating the phishing attack that happened from "198.51.100.40", we were informed by cloud@uni.ex that u are the administrator for said VM, could u please frovide us with logs and content of the site so that we can know what sort of data might have been compromised.

CSIRT-U

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine and there were data about various people - names, emails, etc. Some problem? 

Regards,
Harris

Hi,

since sensitive data may have been stolen we have contacted DPO.

CSIRT-U

Hi,

we would like to inform DPO, of recent event where site "nice-project.uni.ex" had been compromised and sensitive information (names, emails and dates of birth) may have been stolen.

CSRIT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,

thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP.

Sincerely,
Kim Hoffman
Data Protection Officer
